name: Safari Style Tabs in Titlebar for Firefox 4+
description: This Style gives you Safari Style Tabs (upside down) when the tabs are in the titlebar.
additional_info:
If you use an image for the background of the navigator toolbox and have "tabs on top" (with the menu bar off), this style will give you the view back by inverting the tabs. You can also leave this Style enabled, because the tabs are only inverted when they are in the titlebar.
This Style is based upon the default theme running on Windows. 

Special Thanks to user 15980 for helping me finish the Style.
